body:
Hey guys, this is my submission for fouseytube's become a youtube contest, he is giving away 2 terabyte hard drive, a mic, a mac, an xbox, a camera, and a flip cam.

Here is link to my vid : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2viA0uDf9hU&feature=youtu.be
Here is link to fouseytube's vid on how to submit : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vdH8b_AwSi4
 
 
Remember this is off topic, please no complaining, and I am also helping youtubers from avicus if they never knew about this!

title: Fouseytube become a youtuber contest!

replies.body: I have a PC as well. But from time to time I have the opportunity to work on a Mac! I honestly think its better. I mean you get a bunch of free programs. (I think, Hue) Such as: Garage Band (not on PC) Great for making your own music for videos! IMovie(not on PC) Great for enhancing and editing your footage! You can even make movie trailers if you would like! Also so much more that can help with your footage and stuff! Once again, I wish you the best of luck! I would love to enter this contest because I think I have the potential can creativity, I just don't know what to say! :c Good Luck!!! (Again Hue)
